org.mule.transport.http
Class HttpMessageReceiver

java.lang.Object
  org.mule.transport.AbstractConnectable
      org.mule.transport.AbstractMessageReceiver
          org.mule.transport.tcp.TcpMessageReceiver
              org.mule.transport.http.HttpMessageReceiver
All Implemented Interfaces:
ExceptionListener, Runnable, javax.resource.spi.work.Work, Disposable, Initialisable, Startable, Stoppable, Connectable, MessageReceiver
Direct Known Subclasses:
HttpsMessageReceiver
public class HttpMessageReceiver
extends TcpMessageReceiver

HttpMessageReceiver is a simple http server that can be used to listen for HTTP requests on a particular port.
